text.tspan: Change in GDP per capita, 1820 to 2022
This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.

g.text: South and South East Asia (MPD)South and South East Asia (MPD)
Middle East and North Africa (MPD)Middle East and North Africa (MPD)

text.tspan: Data source: Bolt and van Zanden - Maddison Project Database 2023
Note: This data is expressed in international-$ at 2011 prices.
